code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Arrow=_ref=>{let{start_x,start_y,hiearchy_number=0,subject,className,color}=_ref;const concentration_positions=[["synthetic",["14%","66%"]],["cell",["39%","66%"]],["devices",["64%","66%"]],["imaging",["89%","66%"]]];let sideLine;let bottomLine;sideLine=(start_x/1+5).toString().concat("%");bottomLine=(62-hiearchy_number).toString().concat("%");start_x=start_x+"%";start_y=start_y+"%";let concentration_x="0";let concentration_y="0";for(var i=0;i<concentration_positions.length;i++){if(concentration_positions[i][0]===subject){concentration_x=concentration_positions[i][1][0];concentration_y=concentration_positions[i][1][1];}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("svg",{className:"full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("line",{className:className,stroke:color,x1:start_x,y1:start_y,x2:sideLine,y2:start_y}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("line",{className:className,stroke:color,x1:sideLine,y1:start_y,x2:sideLine,y2:bottomLine}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("line",{className:className,stroke:color,x1:sideLine,y1:bottomLine,x2:concentration_x,y2:bottomLine}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("line",{className:className,stroke:color,x1:concentration_x,y1:bottomLine,x2:concentration_x,y2:concentration_y})]});};export default Arrow;
